answers.author: Gary Huff
answers.text:
Citizens can apply for one of 21 different citizen boards and commissions.  The applications are reviewed by a Boards & Commissions Nominating Committee comprised of the Town Manager, Development Director, and Town Council Member.  Recommendations for appointments are made the the Town Council for official appointment.  Citizens that have graduated from the Town Government Academy get speical consideration.
